business.headline: Tesla planning low-cost Model Y in China. Will India get it too?Production will take place at Tesla's Shanghai factory, its largest production hub, and mass production is expected to begin in 2026.
Intel shares jump 15% as investors welcome new CEO Lip-Bu TanIntel shares closed at $23.70, jumping 14.60% as investors placed their bet on the newly announced CEO.

Holi 2025 stock ideas: These 2 shares could deliver up to 16% gainsFor Holi 2025, Bajaj Broking has recommended two stocks that could see a 16% upside in the next 12 months amid a market correction that has seen Sensex and Nifty on a downward trend.

Sensex, Nifty outlook: Can domestic triggers lift market sentiment next week?Sensex dropped 200.85 points, closing at 73,828.91, while Nifty lost 73.30 points. The market remained volatile, with Nifty closing below 22,400 after fluctuating throughout the session.

Wall Street indices slip as Trump's EU tariff threat raises concernsAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 dipped 0.9 points, or 0.09%, at the open to 5,594.45​, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 70.9 points, or 0.17%, at the open to 41,280.05 and Nasdaq Composite fell 49.9 points, or 0.28%, to 17,598.565.
Old share certificates in your drawer? Here's how you can encash themThe stock value of old shares can be calculated by multiplying the number of stocks held by the current market price.

Check SBI's latest lending rates for March 2025: MCLR and base rateThe updated MCLR rates will directly influence interest rates on various financial products, including home loans, personal loans, and other credit facilities offered by the bank.

BSE, NSE holiday: Is stock market closed for Holi on March 14, 2025?Since there is some uncertainty over whether Holi 2025 falls on Friday or Saturday, it is important to check the official list of stock market holidays for clarity.

Policies are a nightmare: Nithin Kamath on why life insurance is getting tougherSince the onset of COVID-19, insurance companies have faced an increase in claims, which has led them to reassess their underwriting policies and tighten their approval process.

Sensex, Nifty erase early gains to end lower; Auto, IT stocks weigh on marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 200.85 points to end at 73,828.91, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 73.30 points to close at 22,397.20.

Does it make sense to stop investing in mutual funds amid market correction?Sensex and Nifty are down nearly 15% from their September all-time highs as volatility continues to make its presence felt, and market correction is the flavour being served on Dalal Street.

March 15 advance tax deadline: Are you required to pay?Salaried individuals, freelancers, and businesses must pay advance tax if their total tax liability (after TDS/TCS) exceeds Rs 10,000 in FY 2024-25.

entertainment.headline: Kim Soo-hyun's agency confirms he dated Kim Sae-ron, denies his role in her deathSouth Korean actor Kim Soo-hyun has been facing a lot of backlash for his alleged involvement in pushing his former girlfriend Kim Sae-ron to the brink of death. His agency has now clarified that the two were indeed dating.

Amitabh Bachchan confirms his KBC return amid retirement rumoursAmid speculation of Shah Rukh Khan or Aishwarya Rai hosting the next season of Kaun Banega Crorepati, Amitabh Bachchan has confirmed his return as the host. The veteran actor expressed gratitude for the love and support he received over the past 25 years.

Singer Shawn Mendes embraces Holi spirit in India, sends wishes to fansSinger Shawn Mendes is in India for Holi. The artiste, who recently performed at Lollapalooza India, extended his Holi wishes on Friday with a vibrant selfie.

Justin Bieber admits feeling 'unqualified, unequipped' in self-critical postSinger Justin Bieber opened up about his inner struggles and feelings of inadequacy amid ongoing health concerns, admitting to often feeling like a fraud despite his success.

Home studio to stardom: Arijit Singh, Martin Garrix unveil new singleSinger Arijit Singh and Dutch DJ and record producer, Martin Garrix, collaborated for a new single, 'Angels For Each Other'. The duo unveiled the song ahead of Holi. Garrix lent his vocals for the first time.

Kim Soo-hyun's co-star Seo Ye-ji on rumours of dating him: Please stopA recent controversy involving K-drama actor Kim Soo-hyun has dragged his former co-star Seo Ye-ji into the limelight. She addressed rumours linking her to the actor and expressed her frustration on her fancafe, clarifying that she has no personal ties with Kim Soo-hyun.

Liberal women like Ratna Pathak Shah often question sanskriti: Actor Rajesh KumarActor Ratna Pathak Shah's remarks on Karva Chauth in 2022 sparked a debate, leading to a response from her co-star Rajesh Kumar, who defended traditional customs.

It's do or die for Siddharth as cricketer Arjun in Test promo. WatchCricketer R Ashwin unveiled the character promo of Siddharth as Arjun in Netflix's upcoming project, Test. The film will stream on Netflix from April 4.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian didn't know Ambanis, yet attended the weddingKim Kardashian and Khloe recall their time in India from last year when they flew down to attend the grand wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Kim reveals that she didn't know the Ambani family and still decided to participate in the festivities.

Honey Singh on making socially responsible songs: We are artistes, not scholarsSinger and rapper Yo Yo Honey Singh, in an interview with India Today Digital, got candid about crafting socially responsible songs for the youth. The singer added how his attempts to craft such songs failed to resonate with the audience.

Kim Soo-hyun faces backlash amid Kim Sae-ron controversy, loses brand deals: ReportKim Soo-hyun is embroiled in controversy over his alleged past relationship with the late Kim Sae-ron. The actor faces backlash, losing followers and brand deals.

The art of filmmaking with Daredevil Born Again – A technical marvelDaredevil Born Again has captivated audiences with its unique approach to cinematography and storytelling. The show, consisting of seven episodes, is streaming on JioHotstar.

Maui Police chief accused of covering up alleged Diddy, Odell Beckham Jr. assaultMaui Police Chief John Pelletier is accused of covering up an alleged gang rape involving Sean 'Diddy' Combs, Odell Beckham Jr, and Druski. The lawsuit claims Pelletier attempted to conceal the 2018 assault.

More photos from Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal's Haldi out. Seen yet?Prajakta Koli's friend has shared more photos from her and Vrishank Khanal's Haldi ceremony on Instagram. Check out the pictures here.

Panchayat actor Durgesh Kumar 'struggling' despite hit projects in 25-year careerActor Durgesh Kumar, known for his roles in Panchayat and Laapataa Ladies, shared that he still struggles to find significant roles despite his success. He said that he still has to chase casting directors for auditions despite recognition in his 25-year-long career in the industry.

TV actor Aditi Sharma responds to allegations of cheating from estranged husbandAditi Sharma refuted her estranged husband Abhineet Kaushik's allegations of infidelity, asserting that their marital issues stem from his insecurities and not her actions. She also claimed that she faced 'serious problems' in the four months of marriage.

Kim So-hyun's relationship with Kim Sae-ron confirmed by Dispatch. DetailsA news report by Dispatch shed light on the controversy surrounding Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron's alleged past relationship and the financial and emotional turmoil Kim Sae-ron faced, which might have led up to her tragic death.
K-pop group NMIXX makes a bold comeback with High HorseK-pop group NMIXX is making a bold comeback with High Horse. And this time, they have a surprise for their desi fans.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian search for their missing diamond at Ambani wedding. WatchIn the latest promo of The Kardashian Season 6, Kardashian sisters, Kim and Khloe, are seen panicking over their missing diamond as they attend the grand Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding in Mumbai.

general news.headline: World knows the epicentre of terror: India slams Pakistan over train hijack claimIndia on Friday dismissed Pakistan's terrorism allegations, stating the world knows the true "epicentre of global terrorism". This came after Islamabad accused India of backing terror but did not directly link it to the Balochistan train attack that killed 21.

Drunk driver's rampage caught on camera, kills woman, screams 'another round'The driver, a student from Varanasi, came out of the car that was severely damaged following the accident, and screamed "another round" multiple times by throwing his arms in the air.

Putin thanks PM Modi, Trump for 'noble mission' to resolve Ukraine conflictRussian President Vladimir Putin, in his first reaction to America's 30-day Ukraine ceasefire proposal, thanked Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi for their "noble mission" to resolve the conflict.

BJP, AIADMK walkout in Tamil Nadu assembly over rupee symbol move, liquor scamThe BJP and AIADMK walked out of the Tamil Nadu Assembly during the Budget 2025-26 session, protesting the DMK's move to replace the rupee symbol and alleged TASMAC corruption. BJP's Annamalai called the budget an "eyewash," while AIADMK raised Rs 1,000 crore TASMAC scam allegations.

Video: Car driver rams, drags neighbour's bike, sends woman flying in MangaluruA retired BSNL employee, was arrested for allegedly ramming his car into his neighbour's motorcycle in Mangaluru amid a longstanding dispute. The impact also injured a pedestrian woman. Police have registered cases for attempted murder and negligent driving.

Axar Patel replaces Rishabh Pant as Delhi Capitals captainIPL 2025: Delhi Capitals have named Axar Patel as their new skipper before the upcoming edition of the tournament. Axar has taken charge after the Capitals failed to make their way through to the play-offs three seasons in a row from 2022 to 2024.

Zelenskyy rips Putin for truce terms: Doesn't want it but scared to tell TrumpUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has slammed his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin for the latter seeking clarifications and conditions on the US's ceasefire proposal, saying he is preparing to reject it but is afraid to tell that to Donald Trump.

Stop sending your players: Inzamam asks other boards to boycott IPLInzamam-ul-Haq said that if India don't send their players to take part in foreign T20 leagues, other boards from around the world should take a similar chance and stop sending players to the Indian Premier League (IPL).

How the Maratha Deccan became the ulcer of Aurangzeb's empireAurangzeb inherited one of the largest empires in history — but his tallest ambition of annexing the Deccan region was among the reasons for the ruin of the Mughal empire. His "obsession" with the Deccan drained resources, alienated allies, and left him battling the Marathas, who were relentless in their struggle.

Fire breaks out at apartment building in Rajkot, 3 killed, 50 rescuedA massive fire broke out in the Aslantis building on 150 Feet Ring Road during Holi, trapping over 30 people. At least three lost their lives as flames engulfed the sixth floor.

Tamil Nadu budget announces language museum after replacing rupee symbolTamil Nadu will set up the 'Agaram – Museum of Languages' in Madurai to showcase Tamil's antiquity and evolution. Meanwhile, the state accuses the Centre of withholding education funds and vows to uphold its two-language policy.
Watch LIVE: Total Lunar Eclipse turns the Moon blood redA total lunar eclipse occurs when the Earth's shadow covers the entire Moon, blocking direct sunlight.

Bhopal man steals Rs 21 lakh Thar to celebrate friend's birthday, gets caughtA man named Tulsiram was arrested in Bhopal for stealing a Thar Roxx worth ₹21 lakh after its owner's death, attempting to sell it but getting caught before finalising the deal.

Video: American Airlines plane catches fire, passengers evacuate onto wingsAn American Airlines plane caught fire at a Denver airport gate on Thursday, forcing an emergency evacuation. Thick smoke billowed as passengers fled, but firefighters contained the blaze, and no injuries were reported.

Trump eyes more troops in Panama to fulfil goal of 'reclaiming' canal: ReportThe White House has ordered the US military to plan a troop increase in Panama to support President Trump's goal of "reclaiming" the canal, reportedly to curb China's influence and secure US control.

Over 57% of corporate men in India face vitamin B12 deficiency: SurveyA recent study found that more than 57% of corporate men suffer from vitamin B12 deficiency, a crucial nutrient for energy and brain function.

Be Happy review: Abhishek Bachchan dances, but the story tripsReleased-Fri Mar 14, 2025Be Happy promises an emotional father-daughter tale but stumbles with a half-baked story and predictable tropes. Abhishek Bachchan delivers a heartfelt performance, but even he can't save this lacklustre dance-drama. Weak storytelling makes it forgettable in the realm of OTT content.

Hayley Matthews starred with both bat and ball in Mumbai's dominating win.

NCAA Tournament: Minnesota fires coach Ben Johnson over 56-71 record in four yearsMinnesota fired coach Ben Johnson on Thursday after four years of repeatedly rebuilding rosters at his alma mater without coming close to an NCAA Tournament appearance.

Champions League: UEFA to discuss penalty rules after Alvarez VAR controversyChampions League 2025: UEFA, the governing body of European football, has said it will discuss penalty rules the game's lawmakers following controversy over the much-debated double touch rule, which led to Julian Alvarez's penalty being disallowed in Atletico Madrid's defeat to Real Madrid on Wednesday, March 12.

Fast bowler Mark Wood likely to miss India Test series, out of action for 4 monthsFast bowler Mark Wood is likely to miss the five-Test series against India at home in June-August. Wood underwent surgery after a long-standing knee injury flared up during the Champions Trophy 2025.

West Virginia coach bans players from dancing on TikTokWest Virginia football coach Rich Rodriguez banned players from dancing on TikTok, emphasizing discipline and team image. While allowing the app, he prioritizes football over social media engagement for his athletes.

Mitchell Starc agrees India had clear advantage in Dubai during Champions TrophyAustralia fast bowler Mitchell Starc agrees that India had a clear advantage in Dubai during the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. India played all of their matches at the same venue after refusing to travel to Pakistan.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
